gold_017_line_144: ɡisˈinu ʃeʃnˈej haʁaʔajonˈot jiχlˈelu ktaʔˈim ʔaχeʁˈim leɡˈamʁe.
gold_020_line_002: ʔˈokej, ʔˈaz bˈo nˈeleχ mahakˈelel hakavˈet beχˈelek hakˈal, ʔˈaʁ ʔˈaf ʃekvˈaʁ ʔaχʃˈav hateχnolˈoɡja meʔˈod meʔˈod maʁʃimˈa.
gold_020_line_006: ʔavˈal lˈo hˈi ʔadˈajin bosʁˈet, zˈe beχˈelek hakˈal. beχˈelek hajotˈeʁ mitkadˈem meʔaχˈa ʃekvˈaʁ hajˈom kvˈaʁ baʃalˈav hazˈe hateχnolˈoɡja, zˈot ʃˈel havinˈa hamelaχutˈit bitχˈum mibˈud haʃfˈa.

gold_020_line_046: ʔˈim ʔatˈa ʔaχʃˈav taχʃˈov ʃeʔatˈa ʔoʁˈeχ dˈin, haʔoʁˈeχ dˈin ʃeʔovdˈim ʔˈal ʔejzeʃehˈu kˈejson ʔˈoʁ hasavˈuχ veʔatˈa meχapˈes ʔˈet takdimˈim ʔˈim ʔˈo meχapˈese kˈol minˈej tovanˈot metsikˈot kˈod meʔˈot ʔomˈaʃu kazˈe.
